Name: Loyalist
Details: During the FedCom Civil War, the Loyalist faction consisted of people and military units who were loyal to Archon-Princess Katherine Steiner-Davion, hence the term.  During the War, Loyalists were opposed by Allied units who openly supported Archon Katherine's brother and archenemy, First Prince Victor Steiner-Davion.  Loyalists are gaining a reputation for ruthlessness and immorality.
